data.name: IronCommando/钢铁突击队
data.detailed_description:
new version info

version 1.2.0:

1 add new character "ninjia"
2. Add local 2 player mode
3 add local 1 player control 2 role mode
-------------------------------------------------

New character: ninjia.
Use knives and darts to attack, and can use special skills: Separation



In the STG mode, the game integrates the elements of "build" and strengthens itself through the rewards collected in the level. You can not only improve your ability permanently, but also buy consumption props and renewal opportunities. The store is the key to success.

powerful enemy leader

A wonderful plot is inseparable from the powerful enemy, who defeats the leader of the enemy and uncovers the plot behind step by step.
In addition to large-scale mechanical boss, the game also designed a lot of human type boss; for the sake of world peace, we must defeat them!

different characters have different ways of playing, and each character has a different experience.

    Different weapons - machine guns, pistols, shotguns, missiles, proliferation bombs and so on
    Different abilities - roll, sprint, extra weapons, etc
    Different intensities - different basic abilities, good at firearms, melee, evasion. Defense, different tendencies of explosives
Combined with operating habits, choose your favorite role!

support system

You only have one chance to pass. All resources should be obtained during the game, including the chance to continue.
But it doesn't matter. With each pass, you can get a certain "points" reward. With "points", you can buy powerful support capabilities, such as increasing the number of default renewal, unlimited ammunition weapons, etc.
data.about_the_game:
new version info

data.short_description: Open the game, incarnate the warrior, pour the bullet on the enemy, smash the ambition of the evil army! STG + "store" system. Targeted purchase of props, strengthen the ability, is the key to customs clearance. You can choose a number of soldiers with different performance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB)
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
